The Elder Who Attended to the Bodhi Tree
I was devoted to constant attendance,
and I went to the supreme Bodhi Tree.
Having attended to it in the morning and evening,
and being urged by a dry root,
For one hundred and eighteen eons,
I did not fall into the lower realms.
from here I was a lord of the people,
